name: 钟文琦
bio_zh: 我目前是西北工业大学自动化学院的四年级（2020年-至今）硕博连读研究生，师从张鼎文教授。我的研究方向包括眼动、视频生成、医学影像分析。
bio_en: I am currently a fourth-year Ph.D. candidate in an integrated master’s–doctoral program (2020–present) at the School of Automation, Northwestern Polytechnical University, supervised by Professor Dingwen Zhang. My research interests include eye-tracking, video generation, and medical image analysis.
research_interests: 眼动、视频生成、医学影像分析
